title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-4.3 - Non-disclosure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-4.3 - Non-disclosure

State Regulations

Home inspectors shall not disclose to a third party the
contents of a home inspection report or any observations, deductions, opinions
that pertain to a home inspection report without the prior consent of the
client or the client's representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
§§
197-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
